document_data.caption: A map showing Mithel in south Halruaa.
document_data.name: Mithel
document_data.mainbody: '''Mithel''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Mithel was located on the coast of southern Halruaa. The town sat on the [[Great Sea]] in the [[Bay of Halruaa]] south and east of the mouth of [[Halagard Channel]].
document_data.Activities: Mithel was a favored docking spot for [[Durpar]]ian merchant ships.
document_data.History: The town was occupied by the forces of [[Reinhar I]] in the 6{{th}} century DR.
